WRITING.TITLE: Whilst trying to use your phone overseas

WRITING.TEXT: Apparently the next big bad will be coming from near the Cape of Good Hope, South Africa
Nope, I'm just a useless douche

WRITING.TITLE: Found the road to the hell mouth

WRITING.TEXT: Colourless not clear. Just being pedantic.

Just followed the instruction on the packet. Did two, the first was ok but the second produced my little forest. It did say to only use them no more than 3 times in a week and my nose does feel quite dry
